description: This notification is generated when a
zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus object for one of the
configured tunnels is about to leave the down state
and transition into up state.
Indicates the actual operational status of this
tunnel, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this tunnel.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus

description: This notification is generated when a
zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus object for one of the
configured tunnels is about to leave the up state
and transition into down state.
Indicates the actual operational status of this
tunnel, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this tunnel.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus

description: This notification is generated when a
tunnel is MBB.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsLspChange ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOutLabel u 9999 ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOutIntf s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus i 1

description: Out label of local tunnel.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOutLabel

description: The name of out interface that local tunnel transits.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOutIntf

tunnel, which is typically but not limited to, a

this tunnel.

description: This notification is generated when tunnel state changed
for example tunnel hotstandby bind or delete,tunnel creat successs
tunnel config success or fail...
Indicates the actual operational status of this
tunnel, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this tunnel.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-TE-MIB::zxr10MplsTunnelOperStatus
